title: Who am I?
text: Leo, 1.95m of mathematics and curly hair. Based at the Plateau de Saclay since September 2020, and won’t leave before 2027 (at least).

title: What’s my name
text:
Doctorant INRAE
Sujet : Modélisation stochastique et déterministe de contrôle de populations d’insectes par lâchers de mâles stériles - Applications en agro-écologie et épidémiologie
Encadré par Camille Coron et Luis Almeida

title: Research
text:
Subject: Stochastic and deterministic modeling of insect population control by releasing sterile males - Applications in agro-ecology and epidemiology.
Started on October 2024.
Supervisors: Camille Coron and Luis Almeida.

title: Home
text: Currently doing a PhD in applied mathematics for biology at INRAE

title: Who am I?
text:

title: Teachings
text:
Teaching Assistant for Statistics (33 hours) for first-year students at AgroParisTech.
Teaching Assistant for the course “Data Science: Statistical Learning” (19.5 hours) for second-year students at AgroParisTech.
Teaching Assistant for the course “Modeling and Analysis of Environmental Data in R” (6 hours) for second-year students at AgroParisTech.

title: Who am I ?
text:
Where I’m from ?

Engineer from ENSTA Paris with a research M2 from Université Paris Saclay (M2 MSV- Mathematics for Life Science).
Prépa TSI at Lazaristes.
Bac STI2D, c la débrouille.

title: Who am I?
text:
Where am I from?

Engineering degree from ENSTA Paris with a research Master’s (M2 MSV - Mathematics for Life Sciences) from Université Paris Saclay.
Prépa TSI at Lazaristes.
Bac STI2D, c la débrouille.

title: Research
text:
Research Interests
I study stochastic tools such as branching processes, birth-death processes, and stochastic diffusion to model the behavior of insect populations, specifically Aedes polynesiensis, based on data from the Tetiaroa atoll.
My research focuses on studying the conditions for extinction or control of extinction of a given population using Sterile Insect Technique (SIT) or Incompatible Insect Technique (IIT).
